article.title: Lockheed Martin to Support Helicopter Software Update
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems and Training, Owego, N.Y., is being awarded a $39,427,558 cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to provide flight test, technical, management, and process support services necessary to update and maintain operational software, vendor software, maintenance-related software, and laboratory support software in support of the MH-60R/S and SH-60B aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity (N00019-13-D-0011).
